newsitem.title: UK: Diana confesses her ambition to be ballerina.
newsitem.headline: Diana confesses her ambition to be ballerina.

text.p: Princess Diana confessed on Wednesday she would love to have been a ballerina but grew too tall.
She confessed to her dancing ambitions when surrounded by 65 ballerinas appearing to publicise the largest production of "Swan Lake" ever staged in Britain.
Diana told the London Times she had once wished to be a ballerina but grew too tall. "I rather overshot the mark," she said.
The world's most photographed woman teased cameramen and told them "Get on with it" as she posed with English National Ballet dancers who held their poses as long as she did her smile.
She is the patron of the ballet, one of the few charity commitments she has maintained since divorcing heir-to-the-throne Prince Charles.
